column2: BRIEF-KeyCorp Declares Increased Quarterly Common Dividend Of Twelve Cents Per Share May 9 (Reuters) - KeyCorp: * KEYCORP DECLARES INCREASED QUARTERLY COMMON DIVIDEND OF TWELVE CENTS PER SHARE * KEYCORP - BOARD OF DIRECTORS DECLARED CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.12 PER SHARE * KEYCORP - CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.12 PER COMMON SHARE REPRESENTS A 14% INCREASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Keycorp Issued $750 Mln Of 4.1 Pct Senior Medium-Term Notes, Series O, Due April 30, 2028 April 30 (Reuters) - KeyCorp: * KEYCORP - ISSUED $750 MILLION OF 4.100% SENIOR MEDIUM-TERM NOTES, SERIES O, DUE APRIL 30, 2028 Source : bit.ly/2HIQLPA Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Keycorp Reports First Quarter 2018 Net Income Of $402 Million, Or $.38 Per Common Share April 19 (Reuters) - KeyCorp: * REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 NET INCOME OF $402 MILLION, OR $.38 PER COMMON SHARE * QTRLY TAXABLE EQUIVALENT NET INTEREST INCOME $952 MILLION VERSUS $929 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET LOAN CHARGE-OFFS $54 MILLION VERSUS $58 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR * QTRLY ALLOWANCE FOR LOAN AND LEASE LOSSES $881 MILLION VERSUS $870 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR * AT QUARTER-END, COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 RATIO WAS 10.03 PERCENT * QTRLY PROVISION FOR CREDIT LOSSES $61 MILLION VERSUS $63 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR * AT QUARTER-END, TIER 1 RISK-BASED CAPITAL RATIO WAS 10.84 PERCENT * BOTH NET INTEREST INCOME AND NET INTEREST MARGIN BENEFITED FROM HIGHER INTEREST RATES IN QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
